title: Hot Water Bottle Hill
description: This Wonderful book of fantasy poems and rhymes for children is full of funny and exciting stories that Kelvin originally wrote for his own grandchildren.There's nothing better than cuddling up and having a poem or story read to a child at bedtime, or indeed for children to read themselves, and escape for a while from all the modern technology and games that kids seemed to be so enthralled with these days.So please come on in and meet, "The boy who swallowed his Teacher", find out, "Who ate all the chocolate cake" and join in with all the fun of, "Adventures on a rainy day". And many, many more."Hot Water Bottle Hill", is a thrilling make believe land for children and adults alike to lose themselves in, time and again.
author: Kelvin Smith
